\kevSo, I'm in the fur trade now, right?

\kevAfter a bit more waiting this morning,

I came here to search for answers.
\kevThing is, the guards won't talk to me,
and all the people I talked to barely knew

\kevI'm thinking... and, yes I know this is a
bit of a stretch, but... I think it's possible
that an organized crime group may have set up
base here in Adon and intercepted my package.
\kevI know, I know, it sounds farfetched,
but think about it. The little information
that I got informed me that several other
people never received some of their packages.
\kevThe thing is, if I want to do anything,
I'm gonna' need to know about the group.
And I don't even have a name...
\p3We might have some information for you.
